main_definition: A thin layer of material, usually plastic, that covers or wraps something; in the context of entertainment and media, it refers to a motion picture.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In general, any thin layer covering an object
meanings_and_examples.example: The film on top of this glass protects it from scratches.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A motion picture or movie in the context of entertainment and media
meanings_and_examples.example: I just watched a really good film last night at the cinema.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The plastic material used to make photographic emulsion for projecting images onto a screen, which is also applied to camera lenses in photography
meanings_and_examples.example: Film developers use chemicals to process and develop the film after it's been exposed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A thin layer of material used in various applications such as insulation, packaging, or decoration
meanings_and_examples.example: The gift box was wrapped with a shiny cellophane film to make it look more appealing.
